concept.title: How Function Execution Works
concept.shortdesc: Using the vFabric GemFire function execution service, you can execute application functions on a single server member, in parallel on a subset of server members, or in parallel on all server members of a distributed system.

conbody.p: Using the vFabric GemFire function execution service, you can execute application functions on a single server member, in parallel on a subset of server members, or in parallel on all server members of a distributed system.
